00095          #define STRINGCODE_MASK 0x00FFFFFF
00096 
00101          #define EXITCOUNT_MASK 0xFF000000
00102 
00103 
00114          #define LANGUAGE_CODE_MASK 0x0000000F
00115 
00119          #define LANGUAGE_CODE_SHIFT 0
00120 
00127          #define GET_LANGUAGE_CODE(a) StringTable::languageCode( \
00128             (LANGUAGE_CODE_MASK & a) >> LANGUAGE_CODE_SHIFT)
00129 
00133          #define MAX_TURN_NUMBER_MASK 0x000000F0
00134 
00138          #define MAX_TURN_NUMBER_SHIFT 4
00139 
00147          #define GET_MAX_TURN_NUMBER(a) (MAX_TURN_NUMBER_MASK & a) \
00148             >> MAX_TURN_NUMBER_SHIFT
00149          
00153          #define SIGNPOST_TEXT_MASK 0x00000100
00154 
00158          #define SIGNPOST_TEXT_SHIFT 8
00159 
00166          #define PRINT_SIGNPOST_TEXT(a) \
00167             (SIGNPOST_TEXT_MASK & a) >> SIGNPOST_TEXT_SHIFT
00168 
00172          #define DISTANCE_FORMAT_MASK 0x00001800
00173          
00177          #define DISTANCE_FORMAT_SHIFT 11
00178          
00184          #define GET_DISTANCE_FORMAT(a) StringTableUtility::distanceFormat( \
00185             (DISTANCE_FORMAT_MASK & a) >> DISTANCE_FORMAT_SHIFT )
00186          
00190          #define WAP_FORMAT_MASK 0x00002000
00191 
00195          #define WAP_FORMAT_SHIFT 13
00196          
00204          #define WAP_FORMAT(a) \
00205             ((WAP_FORMAT_MASK & a) >> WAP_FORMAT_SHIFT) != 0
00206          
00210          #define COMPASS_LANGUAGE_SHORT_MASK 0x00004000
00211 
00215          #define COMPASS_LANGUAGE_SHORT_SHIFT 14
00216 
00224          #define COMPASS_LANGUAGE_SHORT(a) \
00225             ((COMPASS_LANGUAGE_SHORT_MASK & a) \

00241 
00245          #define START_HOUSENUMBER_DIR_SHIFT 15
00246

00256              >> START_HOUSENUMBER_DIR_SHIFT)

00530          if ( getText() != NULL )
